full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 POTIONAL FORM 230 (English/Vietnamese) (Rev. 6-82) 5 DO NOT WRITE BELOW THE FOLLOWING LINE The consular officer will assist you in answering parts 43 and 44 (XIN DUNG VIET Gi Duoi HANG NAY) (Vien chuc lanh-su se giup duong don tra loi phan 43 va 44) I claim to be exempt from ineligibility to receive a visa and exclusion under item in part 40 for the following reasons: (Toi xin thifih-cau duoc dac-mien Khoi su thieu tu-cach lanh chieu-khan va bj loai-tru nhu? ui-dinh duoi Khoan phan 40 vi cac ly do sau day) 212(a)(14) Beneficiary of Waiver under 212(a)(28)(1)(i) 212(b)(1) (Dude huong dac mien theo). 212(a)(28)(I)(ii) 212(b)(2) Not applicable 212(e) 212(h) (Khong ap dung) 212(g) 212(i) Attached (Dmh Kem) 44. I claim to be a (Ti thinh cau duoc) preference immigrant subject to the numerical limitation for (Foreign state or dependent area) Xep hang tuy-thuoc gi8i-han tuc-so danh cho (ngoai xu hay vung phy can nao) Special immigrant not subject to limitation (Nhap-cu dac cach Khong tuy thuoc gioi-han) Immediate relative of a United States citizen (Nhap-cu voi tuf-cach than-nhan ruot cua mot cong-dan Hoa-Ky) My claim is based on the following facts: (L3i thinh cau cua tdi ₫18c can cup tren các su kien sau day) I am (my is) the beneficiary of a petition. [T8i là ( cua toi là) ngúoi diduce huong] (môt don xin ) I am a returning resident alien. (Toi la mot ngoai Kied thuong-tru I derive foreign state chargeability under Section 202(b) through my (Ti duoc Ke vao tuc-so nhap-cu danh cho ngoai qui-dinh doan 202 (b) qua cua toi) Other (specify) Dieu gi Khac (xin noi ro) I understand that I am required to surrender my visa to the United States Immigration Officer at the place where I apply to enter the United States, and that the possession of a visa does not entitle me to enter the United States if at that time I am found to be inadmissible under the immigra- tion laws. I understand that any willfully false or misleading statement or willful concealment of a material fact made by me herein may subject me to permanent exclusion from the United States and, if I am admitted to the United States, may subject me to criminal prosecution and/or deportation. I, the undersigned applicant for a United States immigrant visa, do solemnly swear (or affirm) that all statements which appear in this application have been made by me, including the answers to parts 32 through 41 inclusive, and are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief. I do further swear (or affirm) that, if admitted into the United states, I will not engage in activities which would be prejudicial to the public interest, or endanger the welfare, safety, or security of the United States; in activities which would be prohibited by the laws of the United States relating to espionage, sabotage, public disorder, or in otehr activities subversive to the national security; in amy activity a purpose of which is the opposition to, or the control, or overthrow of, the Government of the Unites States, by force, violence, or other unconstitutional means. Toi hieu ro rang toi phai nop chieu-Khan lai cho Vien-chuc Nhap-Cuf Hoa-Ky tai dia-diem ma toi xin nhap-canh Hoa-Ky, va hieu rang du cho co chieu- Khan toi cung Khong co quyen nhap-canh Hoa-Ky, neu Khi do cac vien-chuc nhan thay rang toi Khong co the nhap-canh duoc theo luât phap nhap-cu? Ti hieu ro rang moi CO Khai man, Khai lac hay giay-giem mot su kien nao deu CO the lam cho toi bi loai-ti vinh-vier Khoi Hoa-Ky va neu da duoc nhap-canh rôi thi CO the lam toi bi truy-to hay truc-xuat, hay ca hai. Toi Ky ten duoi day, duong don xin chieu Khan nhap Hoa-Ky, xin long-trong tuyen-the (hay cam-Ket) rang moi loi Khai ghi tren don nay do toi lam, gom ca nhung cau tra ldi cho cac phan tu 32 den 41, va nhu toi biet va xac tinh thi nhung lói khai nay deu la su that và day du. i cung tuyen-t the (hay cam-ket) them rang, neu dude nhap vao Hoa-Ky, toi Se Khong hoat-dong gi lam thiet-ha cho cong-ich hay nguy-hai cho nen an-ninh, an-toan hay an-ninh cua Hoa-Ky; nhung hoat-dong bi cam chi at-phap Hoa-Ky lien-hé den gian-diep, pha-hoai ngam, pha roi trat-tu' cong cong hay nhung hoat-dong Khac co phuong-hai cho an-ninh quoc-gia; nhung hoat-dong não nham chong dôi, hay Kiem-soat, hay lât do 'chinh-phu' Hoa-Ky bang vo-luc, ao-dong, hay bang cac phuong-tien vi-hien khac. I understand all the foregoing statements, having asked for and obtained an explamation on every point which was not clear to me. (Toi hieu ró tat ca nhung Loi khai tren day sau khi da hói va giai-thich ve moi diem ma toi chua hieu ró). (Signature of Applicant) (chu ky duong don)
